nodes.text: Tovane was a Human male criminal who was imprisoned by the Galactic Republic in Belsavis prison, a prison facility on the planet Belsavis. During the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War, Tovane was freed from imprisonment, and started selling weapons to the forces of the Sith Empire in the Imperial Lodgement in the Minimum Security Section.
Tovane appears as a Weapons Vendor for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
